node.title: Object Orientation is:
node.choices: The bomb. The bee's knees. Uncut cool. The True Way. A good approach to many problems, though not the only one. Useful for really big projects, perhaps, but mostly overrated. Slow, bloated, and boring. I'm a coder, not a theorist. For the weak. As are scoped variables and control structures. Goto++ Something I've been meaning to figure out. So poorly defined, it's hard to venture an opinion. None of the above.
